scripts.dev:all: turbo run build --filter=@repo/ui --filter=@repo/motion && turbo run dev --concurrency=20
scripts.dev:prod: turbo run build --filter=@repo/ui --filter=@repo/motion && turbo run dev --filter=@repo/ui --filter=@repo/motion --filter=api --filter=production
scripts.gen:openapi: (curl -fsSL http://localhost:4000/docs-json -o packages/api-types/schema.json || curl -fsSL http://localhost:4000/api-json -o packages/api-types/schema.json || curl -fsSL http://localhost:4000/api/docs-json -o packages/api-types/schema.json || curl -fsSL http://localhost:4000/api/api-json -o packages/api-types/schema.json) && pnpm --filter @livepro/api-types run gen
